interface:
contract interface IDefaultPool =
  stateful entrypoint send_ae_to_active_pool : (int) => unit
  payable entrypoint receive_ae : () => unit
  entrypoint get_ae : () => int
  entrypoint get_aeusd_debt : () => int
  stateful entrypoint increase_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint decrease_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit

contract interface IPriceFeed =
  entrypoint fetch_price : () => int

contract interface IActivePool =
  stateful entrypoint send_ae : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint send_ae_default_pool : (int) => unit
  payable entrypoint receive_ae : () => unit
  payable stateful entrypoint deposit_to : (address) => unit
  entrypoint get_ae : () => int
  entrypoint get_aeusd_debt : () => int
  stateful entrypoint increase_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint decrease_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit

contract interface ICommunityIssuance =
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (address, address) => unit
  entrypoint issue_lqty : () => int
  stateful entrypoint send_lqty : (address, int) => unit

contract interface IStabilityPool =
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (address, address, IActivePool, address, address, address, ICommunityIssuance) => unit
  stateful entrypoint provide_to_sp : (int, option(address)) => unit
  stateful entrypoint withdraw_from_sp : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint withdraw_ae_gain_to_trove : (option(address), option(address)) => unit
  stateful entrypoint register_front_end : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint offset : (int, int) => unit
  entrypoint get_ae : () => int
  entrypoint get_total_aeusd_deposits : () => int
  entrypoint get_depositor_ae_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_depositor_lqty_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_front_end_lqty_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_compounded_aeusd_deposit : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_compounded_front_end_stake : (address) => int

contract interface IAEUSDToken =
  record allowance_accounts = {from_account : address,for_account : address}
  record meta_info = {name : string,symbol : string,decimals : int}
  stateful entrypoint mint : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint burn : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint send_to_pool : (address, address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint return_from_pool : (address, address, int) => unit
  entrypoint meta_info : () => IAEUSDToken.meta_info
  entrypoint total_supply : () => int
  entrypoint balance : (address) => option(int)
  entrypoint allowance : (IAEUSDToken.allowance_accounts) => option(int)
  stateful entrypoint transfer : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint create_allowance : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint transfer_allowance : (address, address, int) => unit

contract interface ILQTYToken =
  record allowance_accounts = {from_account : address,for_account : address}
  record meta_info = {name : string,symbol : string,decimals : int}
  stateful entrypoint send_to_lqty_staking : (address, int) => unit
  entrypoint get_deployment_start_time : () => int
  entrypoint get_lp_rewards_entitlement : () => int
  entrypoint meta_info : () => ILQTYToken.meta_info
  entrypoint total_supply : () => int
  entrypoint balance : (address) => option(int)
  entrypoint allowance : (ILQTYToken.allowance_accounts) => option(int)
  stateful entrypoint transfer : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint create_allowance : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint transfer_allowance : (address, address, int) => unit

contract interface ILQTYStaking =
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (address, address, address, address, address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint stake : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint unstake : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint increase_f_ae : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint increase_f_aeusd : (int) => unit
  entrypoint get_pending_ae_gain : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_pending_aeusd_gain : (address) => int

contract interface ITroveManager =
  record debt_and_coll = {debt : int,coll : int,pending_aeusd_debt_reward : int,pending_eth_reward : int}
  entrypoint stability_pool : () => IStabilityPool
  entrypoint lusd_token : () => IAEUSDToken
  entrypoint lqty_token : () => ILQTYToken
  entrypoint lqty_staking : () => ILQTYStaking
  entrypoint get_trove_owners_count : () => int
  entrypoint get_trove_from_trove_owners_array : (int) => address
  entrypoint get_nominal_icr : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_current_icr : (address, int) => int
  stateful entrypoint liquidate : (address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint liquidate_troves : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint batch_liquidate_troves : (list(address)) => unit
  stateful entrypoint redeem_collateral : (int, option(address), option(address), option(address), int, int, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint update_stake_and_total_stakes : (address) => int
  stateful entrypoint update_trove_reward_snapshots : (address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint add_trove_owner_to_array : (address) => int
  stateful entrypoint apply_pending_rewards : (address) => unit
  entrypoint get_pending_eth_reward : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_pending_aeusd_debt_reward : (address) => int
  entrypoint has_pending_rewards : (address) => bool
  entrypoint get_entire_debt_and_coll : (address) => ITroveManager.debt_and_coll
  stateful entrypoint close_trove : (address) => unit
  stateful entrypoint remove_stake : (address) => unit
  entrypoint get_redemption_rate : () => int
  entrypoint get_redemption_rate_with_decay : () => int
  entrypoint get_redemption_fee_with_decay : (int) => int
  entrypoint get_borrowing_rate : () => int
  entrypoint get_borrowing_rate_with_decay : () => int
  entrypoint get_borrowing_fee : (int) => int
  entrypoint get_borrowing_fee_with_decay : (int) => int
  stateful entrypoint decay_base_rate_from_borrowing : () => unit
  entrypoint get_trove_status : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_trove_stake : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_trove_debt : (address) => int
  entrypoint get_trove_coll : (address) => int
  stateful entrypoint set_trove_status : (address, int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint increase_trove_coll : (address, int) => int
  stateful entrypoint decrease_trove_coll : (address, int) => int
  stateful entrypoint increase_trove_debt : (address, int) => int
  stateful entrypoint decrease_trove_debt : (address, int) => int
  entrypoint get_tcr : (int) => int
  entrypoint check_recovery_mode : (int) => bool
  entrypoint price_feed : () => IPriceFeed



payable main contract DefaultPool =
  record state = {owner : option(address),addresses : option(DefaultPool.addresses),ae : int,aeusd_debt : int}
  datatype event = TroveManagerAddressChanged(ITroveManager) | ActivePoolAddressChanged(IActivePool) | DefaultPoolAEUSDDebtUpdated(int) | DefaultPoolAEBalanceUpdated(int) | AESent(IActivePool, int) | OwnershipTransferred(address, address)
  record addresses = {trove_manager : ITroveManager,active_pool : IActivePool}
  entrypoint init : () => DefaultPool.state
  stateful entrypoint set_addresses : (DefaultPool.addresses) => unit
  entrypoint get_ae : () => int
  entrypoint get_aeusd_debt : () => int
  stateful entrypoint send_ae_to_active_pool : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint increase_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit
  stateful entrypoint decrease_aeusd_debt : (int) => unit
  payable stateful entrypoint receive_ae : () => unit
  entrypoint owner : () => option(address)
